flawed_nl_solution:
The florist can make 75/5 = <<75/5=15>>15 bouquets of narcissus.
The florist can make 90/5 = <<90/5=81>>81 bouquets of chrysanthemums.
The florist can make 15 +81 = <<15+81=96>>96 bouquets in total.
#### 96

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
